content: this cute twisted headband combines unique stitches with a simple twist that will give you an adorable accessory you ll want to wear all winter long the pattern comes with plenty of photos so you ll know what you are doing every step of the way this listing is for a downloadable pdf of a crochet pattern only you will not receive a physical product skill level easy finished size 4 75 by 20 hook size us size k 6 5 mm yarn samples used category 4 worsted weight yarn main stitches chain half_double_crochet mhdc3tog pattern uses us crochet terms and is available only in english please note that this pattern is available for free on stitching-together com 1 the benefit of purchasing this pdf is an easy to read printable and ad-free version of the pattern 1 https //www stitching-together com/crochet-twist-headband-pattern-free/
